Name: Oldage
About the game: Oldage is a turnbased strategy game with unique characters, charm, and originality. You can create hundreds of combinations of units, weaving a unique strategy each game. Finally, a 0 RNG game that is easy to learn, but hard to master! For FREE! It comes with a competitive ranked ladder, rewarding those with the best strategies! There is also an ELO system, try to become ranked in the top 100! There are currently 5 Ranks: Student: 900+ Elo Scholar: 900 - 1100 Elo Senior: 1100 - 1300 Elo Sovereign: 1300 - 1500 Elo Scarlet: 1500+ Elo And there are prizes for each rank! Scholar Priest: Senior Bishop: Sovereign Pikeman: Scarlet King: Scarlet Queen: The current Top 10 Ranked players will be rewarded with coins every fifth day of the month! Rank 1: 500 coins Rank 2: 400 coins Rank 3: 300 coins Rank 4: 250 coins Rank 5: 200 coins Rank 6: 150 coins Rank 7: 100 coins Rank 8: 100 coins Rank 9: 100 coins Rank 10: 100 coins Download and join the fun and intensity that is Oldage.
